spell_list.description: While a shield is equipped, the next time that the Gladiator successfully blocks/parries/ripostes an attack or an enemy blocks/parries/deflects/ripostes the Gladiator, the Gladiator returns with a counterattack. This effect refreshes every 30 seconds.
